message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for a steal! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to let it go for $18000. What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me at $13000?

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $16000 for the product. Can we discuss further and see if we can find a mutually beneficial price?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14500 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I can see you're really interested in the product, and I appreciate your persistence. However, I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to go up to $17000, but I'm not sure I can go any lower. Can you meet me at $17000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $17000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $14500 and $17000, which would be $15750. Can you consider this offer?

I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal! I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to get a bit closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you at $16500. Can we shake on it at this price?
I'm glad we're getting close, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $16000, which is the last price I can afford. Can you consider this offer?

I think we're really close now! I'm willing to make a final concession. I can meet you at $16250, but that's as low as I can go. If we can't meet at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
